category: Evaluation Committee Regulations/Article 8 (Dismissal of Committee Members)
contents: Article 8 (Dismissal of a member) The chairman may dismiss a member if he or she falls under any of the following. However, in cases falling under subparagraphs 5 and 6, it must be dismissed. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2020. 11. 5. 1. When a member declares that it is difficult for him or her to perform his or her duties. 2. When there is a case of misconduct related to his or her duties. 3. When performing the obligations under Article 13-2. 4. If the member is deemed unsuitable to be a member due to neglect of duty, loss of dignity, illness, or other reasons 5. If the member does not voluntarily evade the request despite falling under Article 13 6. If the member wishes When submitting a resignation letter
